name: jaodsilv-claudius-marketplace
description: Personal productivity marketplace: TDD workflows, job hunting automation, and curated community development tools

plugins.name: brainstorm
plugins.description: Multi-agent requirements discovery through Socratic dialogue and systematic exploration for software/feature ideation

plugins.description: Meta-toolkit for creating, improving, and managing Claude Code plugin components. Requires plugin-dev@claude-plugins-official

plugins.name: planner
